sections.title: Data Collection
sections.content: We collect personal information such as your name, email address, and usage data to provide and improve our services.

sections.title: Profile Information
sections.content: We collect and display profile information such as your name, professional background, and skills to enhance your visibility in the forum.

sections.title: Data Usage
sections.content: Your data is used to personalize your experience, improve our platform, and provide customer support.

sections.title: Cookies
sections.content: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content.

sections.title: Data Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share data with trusted partners to provide our services.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about our privacy practices, please contact us at privacy@oneuniversity.com

sections.title: Data Storage
sections.content: Your data is securely stored on encrypted servers with industry-standard protection measures.

sections.title: International Data Transfers
sections.content: We may transfer your data internationally. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information.

sections.title: Data Protection Officer
sections.content: We have appointed a Data Protection Officer to oversee our data protection strategy and implementation.

sections.title: Data Breach Notification
sections.content: In the event of a data breach, we will notify affected users and relevant authorities as required by law.

sections.title: Compliance
sections.content: We comply with applicable data protection laws, including GDPR and CCPA where relevant.

sections.title: User Controls
sections.content: We provide tools for you to control your privacy settings and manage your data preferences.
